author: CandleSmartHome.com
description: Control to your things from the internet. Encrypted, privacy friendly, and open source.
name: Candle web interface

Authorization token.description: Advanced. An authorization token allows this addon to access your things. The addon normally handles this automatically, but you can create a custom one and enter it here if you prefer.

Web location.description: Advanced. The URL of the online location were you can access the web interface. You can run the relay software on your own webserver if you prefer. The default is the Candle webserver: https://www.candlesmarthome.com/web/

Debugging.description: Advanced. Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
